snippet: The police said a man who left suicide notes had reached for a gun that did not have the orange handle that would identify it as a toy.
abstract: San Francisco police fatally shoot man outside police station who was holding weapon that was discovered to be toy air gun; say he had suicide motive and gun was not marked with orange handle identifying it as toy.
lead_paragraph: The police said a man who left suicide notes had reached for a gun that did not have the orange handle that would identify it as a toy.

headline.main: Man Killed by San Francisco Police Had Air Gun and Suicide Motive, They Say
headline.print_headline: Man Killed by San Francisco Police Had Air Gun and Suicide Motive, They Say
